response.overview: In this intense, psychological horror/thriller, we show you how dangerous it is to be by yourself and what you should be really afraid of. After a long shopping haul, Melissa and Sarah get abducted as they leave the mall. Knowing that their fates have already been decided, Melissa and Sarah conjure up a plan to escape their abductors. Will Melissa and Sarah get out unscathed or will they encounter something more terrifying than they could imagine?
response.title: Abduction
